trends: There have been 37 other sightings in Fort Lauderdale
There were no other sightings in Fort Lauderdale on or around December 19th 2004
divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving south on US-1 in the downtown area of Ft Lauderdale and above me about one degree eastward I saw what appeared to be a rocket or meteor like with a lit tail that faded and immediately thereafter it reignited and then vanished. Also, about a year or so previous to that sighting I was driving north on US-1 at approximately the same time and also above me but about a degree west I saw a bright tiny light that went on and just as quickly it went off three times. It moved very quickly. I saw it first north, then almost above me and then behind me. It traveled so quickly that this event did not take more than a second. Both incidents traveled from north to south.
